object.name: AcceptedGiftTypes
object.description: This object describes the types of gifts that can be gifted to a user or a chat.
object.html_description: This object describes the types of gifts that can be gifted to a user or a chat.
object.rst_description: This object describes the types of gifts that can be gifted to a user or a chat.

annotations.description: True, if unlimited regular gifts are accepted
annotations.html_description: True, if unlimited regular gifts are accepted
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if unlimited regular gifts are accepted
annotations.name: unlimited_gifts

annotations.description: True, if limited regular gifts are accepted
annotations.html_description: True, if limited regular gifts are accepted
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if limited regular gifts are accepted
annotations.name: limited_gifts

annotations.description: True, if unique gifts or gifts that can be upgraded to unique for free are accepted
annotations.html_description: True, if unique gifts or gifts that can be upgraded to unique for free are accepted
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if unique gifts or gifts that can be upgraded to unique for free are accepted
annotations.name: unique_gifts

annotations.description: True, if a Telegram Premium subscription is accepted
annotations.html_description: True, if a Telegram Premium subscription is accepted
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if a Telegram Premium subscription is accepted
annotations.name: premium_subscription
